title: Motley Fool Money: 03.22.2013
description: The EU attempts to deal with the crisis in Cyprus.  Nike hits a new high.  And Lululemon deals with disclosure issues.   Plus,  Jonah Berger discusses his new book, Contagious:  Why Things Catch On.
content:encoded: The EU attempts to deal with the crisis in Cyprus.  Nike hits a new high.  And Lululemon deals with disclosure issues.   Plus,  Jonah Berger discusses his new book, Contagious:  Why Things Catch On.
